member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Task.EnqueueTimestamp
member.summary: Time (in seconds since the epoch) at which the task was enqueued.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Task.Id
member.summary: Name of the task.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Task.Kind
member.summary: The kind of object returned, in this case set to task.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Task.LeaseTimestamp
member.summary: Time (in seconds since the epoch) at which the task lease will expire. This value is 0 if the task isnt currently leased out to a worker.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Task.PayloadBase64
member.summary: A bag of bytes which is the task payload. The payload on the JSON side is always Base64 encoded.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Task.QueueName
member.summary: Name of the queue that the task is in.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Task.Tag
member.summary: Tag for the task, could be used later to lease tasks grouped by a specific tag.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.Acl
member.summary: ACLs that are applicable to this TaskQueue object.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.Id
member.summary: Name of the taskqueue.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.Kind
member.summary: The kind of REST object returned, in this case taskqueue.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.MaxLeases
member.summary: The number of times we should lease out tasks before giving up on them. If unset we lease them out forever until a worker deletes the task.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.Stats
member.summary: Statistics for the TaskQueue object in question.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.AclData
member.summary: ACLs that are applicable to this TaskQueue object.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.AclData.AdminEmails
member.summary: Email addresses of users who are "admins" of the TaskQueue. This means they can control the queue, eg set ACLs for the queue.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.AclData.ConsumerEmails
member.summary: Email addresses of users who can "consume" tasks from the TaskQueue. This means they can Dequeue and Delete tasks from the queue.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.AclData.ProducerEmails
member.summary: Email addresses of users who can "produce" tasks into the TaskQueue. This means they can Insert tasks into the queue.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.StatsData
member.summary: Statistics for the TaskQueue object in question.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.StatsData.LeasedLastHour
member.summary: Number of tasks leased in the last hour.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.StatsData.LeasedLastMinute
member.summary: Number of tasks leased in the last minute.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.StatsData.OldestTask
member.summary: The timestamp (in seconds since the epoch) of the oldest unfinished task.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.TaskQueue.StatsData.TotalTasks
member.summary: Number of tasks in the queue.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Tasks.Items
member.summary: The actual list of tasks returned as a result of the lease operation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Tasks.Kind
member.summary: The kind of object returned, a list of tasks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Tasks2.Items
member.summary: The actual list of tasks currently active in the TaskQueue.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Taskqueue.v1beta2.Data.Tasks2.Kind
member.summary: The kind of object returned, a list of tasks.

member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.summary: Manage your Tasks and Taskqueues
